showerReviews.reviewText: I love the pool. It is heated and there is plenty of room for folks swimming or exercising.  I like the fact that I can shower and blow dry my hair and leave the Y ready to face my responsibilities straight out the door.

showerReviews.reviewText: The swimming pool water temperature is excellent, clean and the pool is not crowded. I'm able to do my laps with no interruptions. Lockers rooms and shower clean.

… Keep in mind this is essentially the main gym on base. Where most people work out in the morning before reporting for duty. Want a hot shower before heading to work? Go somewhere else. Last Saturday I went to use the ab room and found a …

… -wide basketball that's segregated for additional space with the stationary bikes(due to Covid). There's a lockeroom with shower access. They have 3 calisthenics bars, monkey bars and other calisthenics tools. Before the current conditions …
This is gym is for military and people who work on the base. The work out area is great with 2 racketball courts. There is a locker room with shower but the showers needs some updating.
I'm grateful they were open early but the cold shower was a rough start to the day! None of the women's showers had warm water :(

showerReviews.reviewText:
Nice staff. Shower, lockers weight room available. Can rent shoes and get guest passes at affordable rates. Staff is nice.

Walls are changed every now and again and have a wide range of difficulty.

Fun times!

… I was visiting San Antonio from out of state, and I had some time to climb. I called in advance to ask about facilities (I wanted to shower before hitting my next destination), and I got all the info I needed. …

Love the big space, a variety of problems for all levels, has shower area!! I found the space fun, and clean. Just be careful if your legs aren't covered, to not scrape it on the wall surface bc they're rough (the rough surface is great for …

… facility for climbing. Wall varies about once a month to keep you challenged. WiFi is not very good for spectators however it is free. Shower room, restrooms and workout room plus training classes. What more could you need? Oh yea, they …
